attributes.action: Increase teaching funding to allow at least 2 Teaching Assistants within each classroom (both Primary and Secondary) to give extra teaching support to children with extra learning needs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Children with conditions such as ADHD and dyslexia are being labelled as "distruptive" in the classroom (which I have witnessed in Primary schools) and are being made to stand outside the classroom, hence missing out on vital education.  This I believe is due to lack of specialised trained teachers within the classroom and the government should give more funding to schools to allow teachers to be better trained and increase the number of helpers in each class.
